query:
UPDATE island_guides 
SET topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ¤¿ House Reef Snorkeling', 'description', 'Pristine house reef with 80% live corals, exceptional snorkeling directly from beach'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸŠ Swimming & Sunbathing', 'description', 'Beautiful white sand beaches, crystal-clear waters, perfect for relaxation'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸš¤ Speedboat Excursions', 'description', 'Easy access to nearby resorts and diving sites, multiple daily departures'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ½ï¸ Local Dining', 'description', 'Authentic Maldivian cuisine at budget-friendly prices, fresh seafood'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸï¸ Island Exploration', 'description', 'Walk around the island, visit local shops, experience authentic island life')
),
foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ½ï¸ Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Traditional Maldivian cuisine and fresh seafood'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'â˜• Cafes', 'description', 'Tea, coffee, and light snacks'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸª Local Shops', 'description', 'Snacks and beverages')
),
faq = JSON_ARRAY(

  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸš¤ How do I get here?', 'answer', 'Speedboat from Male: 20-30 minutes ($15-25). Ferry: 1.5 hours ($2-3).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ’° What is the budget?', 'answer', 'Budget travelers: $50-80/day. Mid-range: $100-150/day.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ–ï¸ Is it crowded?', 'answer', 'Less crowded than Male City, more authentic local island experience.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸŒŠ Is it safe?', 'answer', 'Yes, very safe. Friendly locals and good infrastructure.')
)
WHERE name = 'Maafushi'
